messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Did you know, I was crowned the
champion of a swimsuit contest!So now, I’m trying to win a title
at a Pokémon Contest!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I’m speechless!
I never lose when I’m in my swimsuit!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I shouldn’t be worried about what bikini
to wear.The first thing to do is consider what
Pokémon I should be using!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’m so wonderful, I won a swimsuit
contest.I’m going to take you on so that I can
win a Pokémon Contest!
